name: Bubble, Pop, Electric!
description:
Bubblegum soap, you say?  I'll take three!  Fresh out of the fifties with a hefty smack of pure Americana, this soap is amazing; it smells incredible and lathers up like a big bubble dream.  Not only will you smell like Hubba Bubba, your bathroom will also take on the delicious scent of screen siren bubblegum thus negating the need to erm...light matches ;)

This soap is super popular and sells out almost instantly when we're trading at Camden Market.  Now you can buy it online...beat the queues!

This soap is unique to The Soap Stall, designed and fragranced to our top secret recipe!

Ingredients: Vegetable Glycerine, Fragrance, Cosmetic Grade Colour

name: Strawberries & Cream
description:
The quintessential English dessert is now the must-have soap! Designed by Kimberley, our resident soap-chef, to look like a gorgeous jelly pot - this is a soap that not only looks fabulous but whoah! Does it ever smell good! The heavenly scent of perfectly ripe strawberries drifts from each bar, tinged with the sugary smell of jello and ice-cream!

We launched this soap in time for Wimbledon, but then we realised: strawberries & cream were made for celebrating all year round! Each soap is also beautifully presented and tied with a ribbon, making them the ideal gift or wedding favour. Grab this generous handful today, your shower will love you for it! 

This soap is hand-made and unique to The Soap Stall.

Ingredients: Vegetable Glycerine, Fragrance Blend, Cosmetic Grade Colour & a little bit of Love

name: Basil, Sage and Mint
description: Our basil, sage and mint soap is herbal and fresh. A great bar to wake up with or to take camping, it'll keep you smelling clean! This soap is super popular when we're out trading at Camden Lock Market...men buy it to shave with and the ladies love the heady, fresh scent! Grab one while you can, we're always selling out of this one! This soap is hand-made and unique to The Soap Stall. What our customers are saying... "I just shaved with this herby soap; very pleased with the lather and I smell delicious" - Karl, London Ingredients: Vegetable Glycerine Base, Ground Basil, Mint, Fragrance Blend, Un-Coloured: the natural green shade comes from the amazing chopped herbs we use in every bar!

name: Juicy Fruit
description:
Do you remember Wrigley's Juicy Fruit gum?  The juicy scent of this soap was developed quite by accident and is now a highly guarded secret!  If you use this soap, you'll be popping out to stock up on the chewing gum...we certainly did!

Our Juicy Fruit soap smells just like the real thing and has the same red & yellow colours we all remember from the packet. Grab a slice for you and a friend and experience that Wrigley's feeling!

This soap is hand-made and unique to The Soap Stall.

Ingredients: Vegetable Glycerine Base, Fragrance Blend, Cosmetic Grade Colour

name: Party Favours, Wedding Favours & Wholesale Enquiries
description: We are able to cater for any event, and can customise all of our soaps to your specific colour and scent requirements, including personalised packaging to make your special day perfect! Have a baby shower, wedding day, engagement party or civil partnership coming up? We can provide the perfect take-home gifts for your guests. We are also able to provide large quantity wholesale packages at extremely good rates to those wishing to stock our handmade products. Please contact us for a quote at thesoapstall@hotmail.co.uk or using the contact form on site here We can personalise our soaps with any picture you choose (including photographs) using our exclusive water-soluble paper! If you have an idea for a special gift/favor/corporate or branded gift, please get in touch so we can help make it happen. £50.00 minimum spend. We look forward to hearing from you soon! soap, handmade, wedding favors, party favors, Lush, Lush alternative, soaps, handmade soaps, luxury gifts, luxury soaps, baby shower, civil partnership gifts
